easy.q: I have a tail but no body. I can wag or curl up. What am I?
easy.hint: Something you fly with a string.

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?

hard.q: A box contains 3 red balls and 2 blue balls. Without looking, you pick one ball. If you replace it, then pick again, what is the minimum number of draws to guarantee a blue ball is drawn at least once?
